CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 8, 1945, pg. 22, reads: "One of the Best - Ethel Waters, who will open here Monday at the Nixon Theatre in a major role in 'The Passing Show,' is one of America's all-time great entertainers. Miss Waters appeared here last in 'Mamba's Daughters.'"
TitMainTitle: Singer and actor Ethel Waters wearing costume, seated backstage, possibly for production of 'Mamba's Daughters'
